* Contact: JeffTrull
* Brand: Fujitsu Siemens
* Make : Lifebook
* Model: S2010
 

=== Current Issues (Edgy) ===

wired NIC driver 8139too doesn't come back from hibernate, gets strange errors "Chip not responding, ignoring board" in syslog

upon first login, an "Error - KDesktop" window appears with the message "The process for the file protocol died unexpectedly"

onscreen volume/mute control does nothing.  system makes sounds through speakers above keyboard regardless of mute, volume settings.

System hangs with high fan speed and black screen upon resume from sleep.
